title: Ear With Hearing Aid Medium Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Hearing Aid Ear Medium Skin Tone
description: An ear with a hearing aid device, representing hearing, auditory assistance, or sound. This specific emoji depicts a medium skin tone.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the ear with hearing aid emoji features a detailed rendering of an ear with medium skin tone, complemented by a discreet, modern hearing aid. Apple's design language emphasizes smooth surfaces and realistic shading, making the device appear integrated and functional. This emoji serves as a symbol of auditory awareness, the experience of hearing loss, or a celebration of accessibility and technological support, all presented with Apple's characteristic clarity.
